news.title: TSMC profit surges 39% to beat estimates and hit yet another record on AI chip demand
news.summary: Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company reported a 39.1% increase in third-quarter profit, hitting a fresh record despite missing estimates.

news.title: Microsoft will test a Copilot AI feature that performs work on local files in Windows 11
news.summary: Early adopters will be able to tell Microsoft's Copilot assistant to take action on files stored on their Windows 11 PCs. Copilot will be available on Microsoft's Windows 11 operating system.

news.title: Nestle jumps 8% after consumer goods giant announces plans to slash 16,000 jobs
news.summary: Nestle said Thursday it will cut 16,000 jobs. New CEO Philipp Navratil looks to accelerate a turnaround at the consumer goods giant.

news.title: PayPal's crypto partner mints a whopping $300 trillion worth of stablecoins in 'technical error'
news.summary: Paxos, the blockchain partner of PayPal, mistakenly minted $300 trillion of the online payment giant's stablecoin. The company called the mistake a "technical error"

news.title: Tariffs are pushing prices higher and consumers are feeling the hit, Fed's Beige Book shows
news.summary: Companies are caught between absorbing the costs or passing them onto customers, according to a Federal Reserve report. The report was published by the Federal Reserve on Wednesday.

news.title: Here’s a better way to invest for income before money-market yields plunge
news.summary: Make sure investment income continues to flow if interest rates tumble. This is a good time to expand your horizons to make sure you have a safe investment.

news.title: Forget the wealthy. Why this value manager is betting on average Americans, and the stocks he’s buying now.
news.summary: Smead Capital Management’s Bill Smead says when the market correction eventually comes, wealthy Americans won’t help investors’ portfolios.

news.title: A major lender wants to turn mortgages into rewards points. Here’s why you should think twice.
news.summary: United Wholesale Mortgage is teaming up with Bilt to offer rewards points. The move is part of a broader push by lenders to attract scarce borrowers.

news.title: ‘It kind of takes the joy out of cruising.’ Some Norwegian Cruise Line passengers balk at new food-and-drink policies.
news.summary: Wall Street analysts say it's all about paying heed to the bottom line, say Wall Street analysts. But it’s also about paying attention to your customers, they say.

news.title: Nestle earnings beat and 16,000 job cuts prompt biggest one-day jump in shares since 2008
news.summary: Navratil has effected massive organizational changes since his recent appointment barely a month ago. New CEO Navratil was appointed to the role of CEO and COO at the end of last month.
